description: Jean-Louis Leroux admits opening fire on a group of suspected thieves, seriously wounding one.
title: French farmers march to free man who shot teenager
title_page: French farmers march to free man who shot teenager - BBC News
maintext: "We know that the use of weapons is not a solution, we are not asking to protect ourselves in this way, but sometimes dramatic things happen," Herv¨¦ Lapie, president of the local chapter of French farmers' union FDSEA, told the France 3 TV network.
